page.title: 16DOUNE PUPILS' CLOTHES 1985
page.content: I wear{to school}a grey jumper, black trousers, white shirt black and white tie. The girls mainly wear a navy or grey skirt and a blue or white blouse. In summer boys can wear grey shorts and a short sleeve shirt. Girls can wear a blue and white checked dress. {After school}has finished for the day I wear jeans and a jumper or a track- suit. If it is very nice I wear a pair of shorts with trainers. {When we go into Stirling}my mum tells me I have to change into clean clothes either a clean dress or a pair of trousers and a jumper.{One of my best {outfits}for getting dressed up is a velvet skirt, a silky blouse and a velvet waistcoat. I also wear a clean pair of socks and my best shoes. I normally will wash my hair and make it tidy.
